Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.23483218] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli(MIC=3.7μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=51.7μM) ;Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus(MIC=1.5μM), Bacillus subtilis(MIC=1.3μM), Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=10.6μM) ;Yeast:Candida albicans(MIC=7.3μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.23483218] LC50=119μM against rat red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Exhibits antimicrobial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, antifungal activity, and low hemolytic activity against human erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Panurgines, novel antimicrobial peptides from the venom of communal bee Panurgus calcaratus (Hymenoptera Andrenidae).
